name: Number 86: Heroic Champion - Rhongomyniad
text:
2 or more (max. 5) Level 4 Warrior-Type monsters
During each of your opponent's End Phases: Detach 1 Xyz Material from this card. This card gains effects based on the number of Xyz Materials attached to it. â—? 1 or more: Cannot be destroyed by battle. â—? 2 or more: Gains 1500 ATK and DEF. â—? 3 or more: Unaffected by other card effects. â—? 4 or more: Your opponent cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters. â—? 5: Once per turn: You can destroy all cards your opponent controls.
